title: Hosea 6:1
text: COME, and let us return unto the LORD: for he hath torn, and he will heal us; he hath smitten, and he will bind us up.

title: Hosea 6:2
text: After two days will he revive us: in the third day he will raise us up, and we shall live in his sight.

title: Hosea 6:3
text: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

title: Hosea 6:4
text: O Ephraim, what shall I do unto thee?  O Judah, what shall I do unto thee?  for your goodness is as a morning cloud, and as the early dew it goeth away.

title: Hosea 6:5
text: Therefore have I hewed them by the prophets; I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments are as the light that goeth forth.

title: Hosea 6:6
text: For I desired mercy, and not sacrifice; and the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.

title: Hosea 6:7
text: But they like men have transgressed the covenant: there have they dealt treacherously against me.

title: Hosea 6:8
text: Gilead is a city of them that work iniquity, and is polluted with blood.

title: Hosea 6:9
text: And as troops of robbers wait for a man, so the company of priests murder in the way by consent: for they commit lewdness.

title: Hosea 6:10
text: I have seen an horrible thing in the house of Israel: there is the whoredom of Ephraim, Israel is defiled.

title: Hosea 6:11
text: Also, O Judah, he hath set an harvest for thee, when I returned the captivity of my people.
